Papilio_polytes.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Papilio_polytes.notes: A common swallowtail with strong sexual dimorphism. Males are black with white bands; females mimic toxic butterflies. (常見鳳蝶，雄蝶黑底白帶，雌蝶有擬態特徵。)

Papilio_helenus.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Papilio_helenus.notes: Prefers forested habitats. Hindwing has red tornal spots. (常見於森林，後翅具紅斑。)

Papilio_paris.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Papilio_paris.notes: Distinctive greenish-blue band on forewing and large blue patch on hindwing. (前翅綠藍色斑帶，後翅藍斑顯著。)

Papilio_memnon.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Papilio_memnon.notes: Very large swallowtail; females polymorphic. Often mistaken for birdwing species. (大型鳳蝶，雌蝶有多型，常被誤認為鳳蝶屬親緣種。)

Papilio_protenor.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Papilio_protenor.notes: Black-bodied swallowtail with red spots near abdomen. (通體黑色，腹近處具紅斑。)

Graphium_sarpedon.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Graphium_sarpedon.notes: Bright turquoise band across both wings. Very fast flyer. (鮮綠藍色橫帶，飛行迅速。)

Catopsilia_pomona.region: Hong Kong, Asia-Pacific (香港及亞太地區)
Catopsilia_pomona.notes: Common in open areas, migratory species. Yellowish-white wings. (常見於空曠地區，具遷徙性，翅膀黃白色。)

Pieris_canidia.region: Hong Kong, East Asia (香港及東亞地區)
Pieris_canidia.notes: Small white butterfly with black apical markings. (小型白蝶，翅端黑斑。)

Hebomoia_glaucippe.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Hebomoia_glaucippe.notes: Large white butterfly with bright orange forewing tips. (大型白蝶，前翅端鮮橙色。)

Zizeeria_maha.region: Hong Kong, East Asia (香港及東亞地區)
Zizeeria_maha.notes: Tiny blue butterfly; males bluish, females brownish. (體型極小，雄蝶藍色，雌蝶棕褐。)

Acytolepis_puspa.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Acytolepis_puspa.notes: Small gray-blue butterfly with subtle markings. (小型灰藍蝶，翅面花紋不明顯。)

Lampides_boeticus.region: Hong Kong, Asia, Africa (香港、亞洲及非洲)
Lampides_boeticus.notes: Slender-tailed lycaenid with rapid flight. (具尾突，飛行敏捷。)

Heliophorus_epicles.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Heliophorus_epicles.notes: Male has orange-red borders, common in sunny areas. (雄蝶翅具紅邊，多見於陽光充足處。)

Euploea_midamus.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Euploea_midamus.notes: Dark brown with bluish spots. A member of the milkweed butterfly group. (深褐色帶藍斑，屬於斑蝶群。)

Ideopsis_similis.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Ideopsis_similis.notes: Light blue transparent-like wings with black veins. (淺藍色翅，翅脈黑色。)

Danaus_genutia.region: Hong Kong, Asia (香港及亞洲地區)
Danaus_genutia.notes: Well-known tiger butterfly, orange wings with black stripes. (橙色翅具黑色條紋，俗稱虎斑蝶。)

Ampittia_dioscorides.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Ampittia_dioscorides.notes: Skipper butterfly with orange-brown wings. (橙褐色弄蝶，飛行跳躍。)

Notocrypta_curvifascia.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Notocrypta_curvifascia.notes: Dark skipper with prominent white band. (黑褐色弄蝶，具白色橫帶。)

Ypthima_baldus.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Ypthima_baldus.notes: Has three eyespots on forewing. (前翅具三個眼斑。)

Mycalesis_mineus.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Mycalesis_mineus.notes: Brown satyrine, often seen in grassy fields. (褐色眼蝶，常見於草地。)

Lethe_confusa.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Lethe_confusa.notes: Brown butterfly with eye spots on hindwing. (褐色眼蝶，後翅具眼斑。)

Melanitis_leda.region: Hong Kong, Asia (香港及亞洲地區)
Melanitis_leda.notes: Cryptic species resembling a dry leaf when wings are closed. (閉翅時酷似枯葉，偽裝效果佳。)

Faunis_eumeus.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Faunis_eumeus.notes: Brownish-purple wings, prefers shaded forests. (翅色紫褐，多見於陰濕林地。)

Cupha_erymanthis.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Cupha_erymanthis.notes: Bright orange wings with black spots. (鮮橙色翅具黑斑。)

Argyreus_hyperbius.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Argyreus_hyperbius.notes: Orange wings with black borders; also called Indian fritillary. (橙色翅，黑色邊緣，又稱印度金斑蝶。)

Cyrestis_thyodamas.region: Hong Kong, South China (香港及華南地區)
Cyrestis_thyodamas.notes: White wings with fine brown stripes, resembling a map. (白翅帶棕線，形似地圖。)

Neptis_hylas.region: Hong Kong, Asia (香港及亞洲地區)
Neptis_hylas.notes: Dark wings with a broad white band. (深色翅具寬白帶。)

Kaniska_canace.region: Hong Kong, Asia (香港及亞洲地區)
Kaniska_canace.notes: Upperwing dark purple with light markings. Strong flyer. (上翅深紫色具淺斑，飛行力強。)

Abisara_echerius.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Abisara_echerius.notes: Small butterfly with metallic markings. (小型蝶，具金屬光澤斑紋。)

Ariadne_ariadne.region: Hong Kong, South China, Southeast Asia (香港、華南及東南亞)
Ariadne_ariadne.notes: Orange-brown wings with net-like patterns. (橙褐色翅具網狀斑紋。)
